_header: He that made this house for contemplation
_description: Leconfield proverbs: A dialogue on Youth — mainly in couplets

BLRoy18Dii.First Lines: HE that made this hous for contemplacionMyndyde specially exersyse of lernynge and vertu occupacion…
BLRoy18Dii.Last Lines: …And his trust is that he shalbe had in remembraunce.ffor his faithfull goode mynde towardes youthes goode gouernaunce
BLRoy18Dii.Attributed Title: The prouerbis in the rouf of my lorde percy closett at lekyngfelde. (f. 202, in rubric)
